page.title: 17Barbara Davidson Pottery
page.content: Barbara Davidson is an{art and craft} entreprenneur who started her own{ {pottery workshop}in Larbert village.It grew quickly and she moved to bigger premises where she and Karen still hand throw an amazing range of items from cress cats to large casseroles.Increasing orders have resulted in a "Larbert Pottery"factory at nearby Denny.Barbara has also an interest in a "Studio" coffee and craft shop at Linlithgow,where other artists can exhibit or sell their work.Hand thrown pottery is very popular with passing trade, and tourism,especially American,fill order books.In summer,for 50p,people can throw a couple of pots on the wheel.This is a popular {entertainment especially for local children.
